mapper.insert: INSERT INTO annual (type, member_no, content, start, end, half_day_time, head, create_date) VALUES (#{type}, #{memberNo}, #{content}, #{start}, #{end}, #{halfDayTime}, #{head}, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP)
mapper.update: update annual set approve = #{approveCode} where member_no=#{memberNo} and annual_no = #{annualNo}
